title: Things to know for a returning player
body:
Hi there,

I haven't placed since Lucian was released, which i'm pretty sure was just after OCE was opened, and I'm looking at returning to the game.

What would your advice for a returning player? (aside from reading endless patch notes) I haven't been following the game at all since I've left, the last match I played, you had 6 items and had to purchase wards.

What are the biggest changes? Still boots+3 pots?

replies.body:
Harsh-as-fuk Leaver Penalties now

I'm stuck in a loop bug that prevents me from playing PVP at all until Riot fixes the problem >_>

If I were in you I would start either with couple of ARAM just to refresh your skills or some bots to both refresh your skills and discover the new items.
I think you will be back to speed in a week or so :)

Good luck!
Just play until you get back into the groove :)
Jungle probably the biggest changest change so far along with dragon mechanics and baron.
